entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
